# [Infinite loop] Very commonly used line with 4500 characters show infinite loop error

---

_Issue opened by @qarmin on 2023-03-24 18:50_

Ruff  1bac206995043d7d533338b7f8b7db37f37bf43b

```
ruff . --fix
```

File content 
```
class LaotianLocale(Locale):

    day_names = [
        "",
        "ວັນຈັນ",  # vanchan
        "ວັນອັງຄານ",  # vnoangkhan
        "ວັນພຸດ",  # vanphud
        "ວັນພະຫັດ",  # vanphahad
        "ວັນ​ສຸກ",\ # vansuk
    ]
    day_abbreviations = [
        "",
        "ວັນຈັນ",
        "ວັນອັງຄານ",
        "ວັນພຸ
```
fails with message
```
error: Failed to converge after 100 iterations.

This indicates a bug in `ruff`. If you could open an issue at:

    https://github.com/charliermarsh/ruff/issues/new?title=%5BInfinite%20loop%5D

...quoting the contents of `41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py`, along with the `pyproject.toml` settings and executed command, we'd be very appreciative!

error: Failed to parse 41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py: unexpected character after line continuation character at line 11 column 19
41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py:1:1: INP001 File `41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py` is part of an implicit namespace package. Add an `__init__.py`.
41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py:11:19: PLE2515 Invalid unescaped character zero-width-space, use "\u200B" instead
41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py:11:20: E999 SyntaxError: unexpected character after line continuation character
41950PY_FILE_TEST_1152140.py:11:89: E501 Line too long (5028 > 88 characters)

```
